item.title: Why This Blog Exists
item.description: Back in 2020, when I was trying to make the best of my career in tech, I built myself a website using a technology called GatsbyJS. It wasn’t particularly well designed, but I did it from scratch, and I was proud of how it turned out. You can still look at the code for it here. 1 I had plans to use that website as a showcase for myself. I shared my rÃ©sumÃ© there.
